citations.title: McMahan et al., 2017. Communication-Efficient Learning of Deep Networks from Decentralized Data (FedAvg)
Li et al., 2020 (MLSys). Federated Optimization in Heterogeneous Networks (FedProx)
Ma et al., 2023 (PMLR). Asynchronous Personalized Federated Learning with Irregular Clients
Rieke et al., 2024. Privacy preservation for federated learning in health care
Kinyua et al., 2024. Democratizing AI in Africa: Federated Learning for Low-Resource Edge Devices
Implementation and Evaluation of a Federated Learning Framework (framework survey incl. Flower)
